mapper.select: with recursive categoryPath as ( select `id`,`parent_id` from `pms_product_category` where id = #{id} union all select from `pms_product_category` c INNER JOIN categoryPath cp on cp.parent_id = c.id ) select id from `categoryPath`;

select p.*, pl.id ladder_id,pl.product_id ladder_product_id,pl.count ladder_count,pl.discount ladder_discount,pl.price ladder_price, pm.id member_id,pm.product_id member_product_id,pm.member_level_id member_member_level_id,pm.member_price member_member_price,pm.member_level_name member_member_level_name, pf.id full_id,pf.product_id full_product_id,pf.full_price full_full_price,pf.reduce_price full_reduce_price, s.id sku_id,s.product_id sku_product_id,s.price sku_price,s.promotion_price sku_promotion_price,s.low_stock sku_low_stock,s.pic sku_pic,s.sale sku_sale,s.sku_code sku_sku_code,s.stock sku_stock,s.sp_data sku_sp_data, a.id attribute_id,a.produce_id attribute_product_id,a.product_attribute_id,attribute_product_attribute_id,a.value attribute_value from `pms_product` p left join `pms_product_ladder` pl on p.id = pl.product_id left join `pms_product_member_price` pm on p.id = pm.product_id left join `pms_product_full_reduction` pf on p.id = pf.product_id left join `pms_sku_stock` s on p.id = s.product_id left join `pms_product_attribute_value` a on p.id = a.product_id where p.id = #{id}
